title: Course Booking Website
description: A full-stack course booking application developed using modern technologies, allowing users to browse and register for various courses with ease.

title: Bakery Website
description: A responsive and feature-rich bakery website created with the MERN stack, showcasing products and enhancing the overall learning experience.

title: E-commerce Website
description: A responsive and scalable e-commerce website developed using the MERN stack, awarded First Prize for its clean design and seamless functionality.

title: Project To-Do List
description: A modern and efficient To-Do List application built using Vite + React, GraphQL, and Apollo Client, styled with TailwindCSS and powered by a Node.js backend.
